query:
-- Move all booking documents (hotels/apartments) to 'hotel'
UPDATE documents 
SET category = 'hotel' 
WHERE tripId = 30001 AND category = 'booking';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2cdS9hyY6XNQUTe.root --database 2rtwtAqF2DqhH9oEcii9XY --execute 
-- Move all booking documents (hotels/apartments) to 'hotel'
UPDATE documents 
SET category = 'hotel' 
WHERE tripId = 30001 AND category = 'booking';
